mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (isbn, user_id, content, rating) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, b.name as book_name FROM t_comment c LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_book b ON c.isbn = b.isbn WHERE c.isbn = #{isbn} ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT AVG(rating) FROM t_comment WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_comment WHERE isbn = #{isbn} AND user_id = #{userId}
